content.title: Mapping the Data to Service
content.body:
In the Mapping Editor, map the following elements from the left pane to the right pane:

  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField – tbxFirstName, and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, select FirstName {string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField – tbxLastName, and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, select LastName {string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField – tbxNickName, and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, select NickName {string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField – tbxPhone, and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, select Phone {string}.
